Wherever you are and whatever the time, parts availability is key.
Our new cutting-edge paint facility is almost finished 🥳 Only a few days left before the ribbon-cutting ceremony !
Photos from Recuperma.bvba's post

Family-owned company Bornes Recycalge took delivery of a 1,300-tonne side compression shear Lidex. With this new heavy-duty machine, the scrap metal recycling expert is laying the foundations of its future development.

Some key specs :

▪️Up to 70 t/hour
▪️Full automatic cycle
▪️Ultra-rapid cutting blades replacement system 
▪️Cross head in cast steel for a better resistance 

🔗 Read full article in the Lefort Mag #2

https://www.lefort.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Mag-Lefort_No2_2024_A4_EN_WEB.pdf
Crawling into 2025 #HappyNewYear

🎅🏻🎄🎁💫

As we celebrate the holiday season, we want to take a moment to express our heartfelt gratitude to each of you.

May the spirit of Christmas bring peace, joy and warmth to you and your loved ones. 

Wishing you all a merry Christmas and a prosperous New Year, filled with new challenges and success 🥂✨

𝑪𝒉𝒓𝒊𝒔𝒕𝒎𝒂𝒔 𝑱𝒖𝒎𝒑𝒆𝒓 𝑫𝒂𝒚 🎄🎅🏻🎁

Who is your favorite ? 🤩

🎬 𝐍𝐄𝐖 𝐋𝐈𝐃𝐄𝐗 𝟐𝟎𝟎𝟎𝐓 𝐚𝐭 Galloo ♻️
 
No need for words, just turn on the sound and watch !

[𝐒𝐚𝐥𝐞𝐬 𝐌𝐞𝐞𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟒]

Our sales force met at our headquarters in Gosselies 🇧🇪 to prepare for 2025.
 
A busy program spread over two days including workshops, presentation of new products/features, exchanges of best practices but also moments of sharing between colleagues from over the world.
 
The Lefort sales team always there to help our customers and support them in their development 💪🏽
Complimenti e grazie al cliente per la fiducia accordata 🇮🇹 #leforttrax #lefortitalia #forzalefort

𝟏𝐬𝐭 𝐋𝐞𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐋𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐱 𝐢𝐧 𝐓𝐚𝐢𝐰𝐚𝐧 🇹🇼

Lefort is proud to announce the successful commissioning of a first Lidex 1300T at the Taiwanese company, Feng Hsin Steel. 

Proof of the growing interest in Lefort machines from steelmakers, this installation also demonstrates the productivity and robustness necessary for companies wishing to process all kinds of scrap metal at high efficiency. 

A great project smoothly conducted by our teams and our local partners. Congratulations!

LEFORT TRAX 1000

Time for innovation.  the Lefort Trax 1000 will take over the work of the Lefort 900 mobile.
USA 🇺🇸
Australia 🇦🇺

A new LEFORT Koloss 1000 TS has joined the ranks at Dalton Metal Recycling

A new Koloss, for a brand new yard for the Dalton Group in Central/Western Glasgow. This yard is brand new and designed to give the best layout for Metal Recycling. The electrically powered (4x110kW) giant of a shear is now in place and ready to further enhance the processing capability of the Dalton Group. The machine is extremely quick, due to the 4 large electric motors and three valve blocks, making it a very strong and productive machine 💪🏽

—

⚙️ 1000T cutting force, Ts box (wraparound), 180T baling ram, 4 x 110 kW electric motors, 8.0m box length, lid force each lid 400T, hold down 200T, loading hopper, window crosshead, platform & cabin, automatic greasing.
Lindborgs bildemontering ab 🇸🇪💪🏽

“CAT”, the transportable shear baler on tracked vehicle that adapts to your working needs.
The transportable shear baler has 2 independent remote controls, one for the shear and the other one for the traked vehicle: "2" is for safety, "2" is for ease of use; "2" is for not making mistakes, "2" is because 2 are the machines that make up the unit.

Idromec Spa'nın kapak fotoğrafı
Idromec Spa'nın kapak fotoğrafı

Venerdì abbiamo avuto  l’ultimo di 3 incontri con i ragazzi delle scuole secondarie di primo grado di Mozzecane e Nogarole Rocca. I ragazzi, divisi a gruppi, hanno visitato l’officina e gli uffici della ditta dove sono state spiegate loro le varie figure professionali. Il tutto nell’ottica della scelta della corretta scuola secondaria di secondo grado. I ragazzi, accompagnati dai professori, hanno mostrato interesse e fatto domande. Speriamo di essere stati d’aiuto nella scelta del loro percorso di studi che li preparerà alla vita lavorativa. In bocca al lupo ragazzi!

Saremo presenti ad Ecomondo 2024, dal 5 all’8 Novembre. Ci troverete al Rimini Expo Centre, Hall C3, Stand 301. Non mancate!

We will be at Ecomondo 2024, from 5th to 8th November. You will find us at Rimini Expo Centre, Hall C3, Stand 301. Be there!

#ecomondo #idromec #shearbaler #recycling

𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗦𝗘𝗡𝗡𝗘𝗕𝗢𝗚𝗘𝗡 𝟯𝟲𝟬 𝗚 – 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗜𝗻𝗱𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗿𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝟲 𝘁 𝗧𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗱𝗹𝗲𝗿 🆕

The SENNEBOGEN 360 G takes telehandler performance to a whole new level: With its robust steel construction it is built for demanding multi-shift operations in industrial applications and more. 🏭

💪 The best of both worlds: combining the power and Z-kinematics of a wheel loader with the agility of a telehandler. The new addition to our portfolio boosts with even faster work cycles and higher efficiency.  
🔝 Heavy lifter with a 6 t load capacity and an 8.5 m stacking height. 
👷 Newly redesigned Multicab for maximum operator benefits: The cab can be raised to 4.25 m view height, providing an optimal view of trucks, containers, and the entire jobsite. 
🔇Noise & vibration protection, ergonomic controls, and an intuitive touch display ensure a fatigue-free and highly efficient workspace.
🔄 Versatile & customizable: Choose from a wide range of attachments, equipment options, and tire variants to tailor the 360 G to your needs.

📢 Learn more in the press release:
➡️ https://bit.ly/4h2hNBn

📍 Join us at bauma Munich in April 2025 to see the 360 G at our booth!
➡️ https://bauma.sennebogen.com

#Sennebogen360G #Telehandler #Teleskoplader #Industrielader #Wheelloader #MaterialHandling #Bauma2025 #MOVEBIGTHINGS with #SENNEBOGEN, the #GreenHeartofBauma 💚

𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗦𝗘𝗡𝗡𝗘𝗕𝗢𝗚𝗘𝗡 𝟴𝟯𝟬 𝗚 – 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗡𝗲𝘅𝘁 𝗘𝘃𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗶𝗻 𝗠𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝗛𝗮𝗻𝗱𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗴! 🆕

The SENNEBOGEN 830 has been upgraded to the newest G-Series machine generation! The powerful 830 G material handler delivers enhanced efficiency, performance, and operator comfort. 

💪 Up to 17 m reach and a 38 t operating weight make the 830 G ideal for demanding scrap handling, recycling, timber, and port applications.
✅ With its modular design, and various undercarriage and attachment options, SENNEBOGEN can provide you with the ideal solution for your jobsite.
🍃 Optimized for low fuel consumption, reduced emissions, and HVO capability.
👷 New Maxcab Comfort Cab: Designed for operator comfort, featuring the best view, a vibration-resistant workspace, ergonomic climate-controlled seating, and active noise cancellation.
🕹️ With SENcon Control System: The revolutionary new SENcon provides intuitive operation, individual driver profiles, real-time machine insights, remote diagnostics, and over-the-air updates.

Learn more about the 830 G in the press release: 
➡️ https://bit.ly/4b42mac

📍 Join us at Bauma 2025 in Munich in April to see the 830 G at our booth! 
➡️ https://www.sennebogen.com

#MaterialHandling #MaterialHandler #Umschlagbagger #830G #SENcon #Bauma2025 #MOVEBIGTHINGS #SENNEBOGEN the #GreenHeartofBauma 💚

𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗦𝗘𝗡𝗰𝗼𝗻 𝗦𝗘𝗡𝗡𝗘𝗕𝗢𝗚𝗘𝗡 𝗠𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗲 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗼𝗹 𝗦𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺📱🆕

Introducing our new SENcon control system: Smart, more intuitive, future-ready! Designed for operators, fleet managers, and service technicians, SENcon ensures maximum efficiency, safety, and ease of use with a range of powerful features:

🕹️ Customizable Driver Profiles: Adjust joystick settings and machine parameters for personalized comfort and precision.
💡 Intelligent Assistance Systems: Features like the Virtual Wall and load weighing increase accuracy and safety.
📊 Real-time Machine Monitoring: Get instant insights into machine performance and live diagnostics for optimal efficiency.
🔧 Remote Service Support: Diagnose issues remotely, minimize downtime, and ensure fast, targeted maintenance.
🔄 Wireless Over-the-air Software Updates: Always up to date, no on-site visits needed.
✅ Seamless Fleet Integration: Connect with SENtrack telematics system to optimize performance, maintenance, and energy efficiency.

Learn more in the press release: ➡️ https://bit.ly/3CQFGh9

🔜 Stay tuned for the first SENNEBOGEN machines featuring the new SENcon! We will soon introduce the new machines for bauma 2025:
https://bauma.sennebogen.com/

#SENcon #SmartControl #MaterialHandling #FleetManagement #Automation #bauma2025 #GreenHeartofbauma #MOVEBIGTHINGS #SENNEBOGEN

Starte durch mit einer Ausbildung bei SENNEBOGEN! 🚀
🌍 SENNEBOGEN ist ein internationales Familienunternehmen mit über 72 Jahren Erfahrung als Ausbildungsbetrieb. Wir bilden in vielen technischen und kaufmännischen Ausbildungsberufen an den Standorten Straubing und Wackersdorf aus.

💡Erfahre mehr an unserem Berufsinfoabend 2025 in Straubing!
Wir stellen dir zunächst die SENNEBOGEN Maschinenfabrik vor, bevor du dich an verschiedenen Ständen individuell über all unsere Ausbildungsberufe informieren kannst. An den Ständen triffst du sowohl die zuständigen Ausbilder als auch aktuelle Auszubildende, die dir aus erster Hand berichten. 🙌

🗓️ Komme am Mittwoch, 26.02.2025, um 17:00 Uhr
📍 in die SENNEBOGEN Akademie: Sennebogenstr. 8, 94315 Straubing Sand/Hafen 
➡️ Mehr zum Infoabend: https://www.sennebogen.com/karriere/news/infoabend-fuer-eltern-und-schueler
👋 Wir freuen uns auf Deinen Besuch!

🎓 Alles über die Ausbildung bei SENNEBOGEN: 
https://www.sennebogen.com/ausbildung

#Ausbildung #Straubing #Karriere #Azubi #MOVEBIGTHINGS #SENNEBOGEN

𝗚𝗲𝘁 𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗱𝘆 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗯𝗮𝘂𝗺𝗮 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟱 - 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗦𝗘𝗡𝗡𝗘𝗕𝗢𝗚𝗘𝗡! 🙌

From 𝗔𝗽𝗿𝗶𝗹 𝟳–𝟭𝟯, 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟱, Messe Munich will once again host the world's leading trade fair for construction machinery, attracting thousands of visitors. 🚜

💚 For decades, SENNEBOGEN has been a central part of bauma, and we’ll be there again this year! As a family-owned company with Bavarian hospitality and heartfelt values, our booth with its green machines has become an integral part of the fair, known as the "𝗚𝗿𝗲𝗲𝗻 𝗛𝗲𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝗼𝗳 𝗯𝗮𝘂𝗺𝗮".

Efficient Waste Management with the SENNEBOGEN 355 E Telehandler ♻️

The SENNEBOGEN 355 E Telehandler of the Donau-Wald waste management association delivers exceptional performance at the Passau-Hellersberg disposal center! ✅ Under tight schedules, working 4–5 hours a day, it handles paper and bulky household waste and loads it into trucks.
👷Werner Reh operates the 355 E on a daily basis and reports: "We are very happy with the vehicle!"

Why it stands out:
🚛 Elevating cab: Operators benefit from an optimal view over the work environment and can look into the loading trucks.
💪 High-capacity hold-down bucket: The attachment is ideal for efficiently handling loose waste material with its high filling volume of up to 1,400 kg/m³.
🛠️ Reliable SENNEBOGEN service: 💬 "There was always someone available or even on-site if there was a problem."

Special Civil Engineering: 40 Years of Partnership between ABI Group & SENNEBOGEN 👏
In 1984, a success story began when SENNEBOGEN and ABI GmbH joined forces to create innovative solutions for special civil engineering applications. 🏗️ 
Over the past 40 years, this collaboration has shaped the market, delivering customized, efficient machinery that sets global standards in the special civil engineering sector. 
💬 "The number of solutions we have implemented together speaks for the great success of this partnership. We have extensive expertise in building base machines, while ABI is an expert in special civil engineering applications. Together, we provide customers with market-leading solutions in the special civil engineering sector," emphasized managing director Erich Sennebogen during the anniversary celebration. 
🤝 Both companies are looking to the future with confidence, ready to tackle new challenges and opportunities together. 
Read more here: ➡️ https://bit.ly/4h4OC15

Spezialtiefbau: 40 Jahre Partnerschaft zwischen ABI Group und SENNEBOGEN 👏
Im Jahr 1984 begann eine Erfolgsgeschichte, als SENNEBOGEN und die ABI Gruppe ihre Kräfte bündelten, um innovative Lösungen für Anwendungen im Spezialtiefbau zu schaffen. 🏗️ 
In den vergangenen 40 Jahren hat diese Zusammenarbeit den Markt geprägt und kundenorientierte, effiziente Maschinen geliefert, die weltweit Maßstäbe im Spezialtiefbau setzen.
💬 „Die Anzahl der Lösungen, die wir gemeinsam realisiert haben, zeugt vom großen Erfolg dieser Konstellation. Wir verstehen viel vom Bau von Trägergeräten, ABI ist ein Experte für die Spezialtiefbauanwendung. Zusammen bieten wir den Kunden heute marktführende Lösungen im Spezialtiefbau an“, betonte Geschäftsführer Erich Sennebogen anlässlich der Jubiläumsfeier.
🤝 Beide Unternehmen blicken zuversichtlich in die Zukunft und sind bereit, neue Herausforderungen und Chancen gemeinsam anzugehen. 
Mehr dazu hier: ➡️ https://bit.ly/4h4OC15

Sustainable and Cost-Efficient SENNEBOGEN Machine Transport via Water Route 🌍⚓

Our recent shipment of eight large SENNEBOGEN machines from Straubing to South Carolina via eco-friendly waterway marks another step toward sustainable logistics at SENNEBOGEN. 🍃

A total of 700 tons of machinery was loaded onto barges at the port of Straubing. 🚢 Among them were the powerful SENNEBOGEN 855 and 870 material handlers, weighing between 70 and 105 tons. The complex loading process involved precise tandem lifts, performed with a SENNEBOGEN 5500 E Crawler Crane, working in tandem with another crane.

The machines are now traveling via inland and ocean vessels to their final destination in Charleston, South Carolina. 🇺🇸 This water route cuts CO₂ emissions by 75%, saving 49 tons compared to road transport. ✅

Read more here: ➡️ https://bit.ly/3WvwUeZ

On Track for Efficiency: Electric SENNEBOGEN 830 E Material Handler on Rail Undercarriage⚡

RESAG Recycling und Sortierwerk Bern AG has elevated their operations with a new electric SENNEBOGEN 830 E. ♻️ Powered by an efficient 132 kW electric engine, the machine ensures a quiet, low-vibration, and emission-free environment – ideal for indoor operations. 🔇

💬 "In the closed hall, this is particularly important for a pleasant and healthy working environment for our employees," explains René Schneider, Managing Director.

Delivered by Kuhn Schweiz AG, the material handler is mounted on a customized rail undercarriage. 🛤️ Its curved "banana" attachment provides an extended reach for waste sorting and loading tasks.

In addition to the 830 E, the sorting plant uses a mobile SENNEBOGEN 825 E, which mainly supports the company in wood processing - the purchase of a second model is already being planned.

Restoration of historic SENNEBOGEN machines - former apprentice project with a success story 🔧
Our employees Andreas and Alois started their career at SENNEBOGEN with an extraordinary project: the restoration of historical machines for the opening of the Erich Sennebogen Museum in 2014. ✨ 
One of these machines was a SENNEBOGEN S 802 rope excavator, in production between 1958 and 1960. After so many decades, the wear and tear of time had taken a heavy toll on the machine, which had to be dismantled and painstakingly restored. Alongside other historical models, all restored to their former glory, it is a witness to the development of mechanical engineering in our company's history. 👏
Ten years after the museum opened, Andreas and Alois are still part of our team and have made impressive careers since then. 🚀
💡Read more here: ➡️ https://bit.ly/3Assyxo

Restaurierung historischer SENNEBOGEN Maschinen - ehemaliges Azubiprojekt mit Erfolgsgeschichte 🔧
Unsere Mitarbeiter Andreas und Alois starteten ihre Karriere bei SENNEBOGEN mit einem außergewöhnlichen Projekt: der Restaurierung historischer Maschinen zur Eröffnung des Erich Sennebogen Museums um 2014. ✨ 
Eine dieser Maschinen war ein SENNEBOGEN S 802 Seilbagger, in Produktion zwischen 1958 und 1960. Nach so vielen Jahrzehnten hatte der Zahn der Zeit stark an der Maschine genagt, welche  zerlegt und in mühevoller Detailarbeit restauriert werden musste. Im Museum in Straubing zeugt sie seit der Aufbereitung in neuer Pracht neben anderen historischen Modellen von der Entwicklung des Maschinenbaus in der Unternehmensgeschichte. 👏
Auch Andreas und Alois sind zehn Jahre nach Museumseröffnung immer noch Teil unseres Teams und haben seitdem beeindruckende Karrieren gemacht. 🚀
💡Lies hier mehr: ➡️ https://bit.ly/3Assyxo

At SENNEBOGEN, our employees are the foundation of our success. Continuing an end-of-year tradition, we recently honored 28 team members at a festive evening for their incredible milestones of 10, 25, and even 40 years of service to our family company. 👏

SENNEBOGEN ehrt 28 langjährige Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter 💚
Traditionell ehrt SENNEBOGEN zum Jahresende wieder die beeindruckenden Meilensteine von Kolleginnen und Kollegen: 10, 25 und sogar 40 Jahre des Engagements in unserem Familienunternehmen. 👏
Wir danken euch 28 Jubilaren für eure Treue und Leistungen!
💬 "Mitarbeiter sind die Grundlage eines erfolgreichen Unternehmens, und gerade als Familienunternehmen liegt SENNEBOGEN viel daran, die langfristige Beziehung mit den Mitarbeitern aktiv zu pflegen und zu fördern", betonte Gesellschafter Erich Sennebogen bei dem Festakt in Straubing.
💐 Außerdem haben wir den wohlverdienten Ruhestand von fünf geschätzten Kollegen gefeiert. Wir wünschen alles Gute für den neuen Lebensabschnitt! 🍀
